verses.verse: In the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H4074>Medes,<s%> who was made <S%H4427>king<s%> over the <S%H4438>realm<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%>

in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H1840>I,<s%> Daniel, <S%H995>understood<s%> by the <S%H5612>books<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> about which the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> for the <S%H4390>accomplishing<s%> of the <S%H2723>desolations<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> even <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

I <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> by <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and <S%H8469>petitions,<s%> with <S%H6685>fasting<s%> and <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> and <S%H665>ashes.<s%>

I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> and made <S%H3034>confession,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H577>Oh,<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>dreadful<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> who <S%H8104>keeps<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> with those who <S%H157>love<s%> him and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%>

we have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and have dealt <S%H5753>perversely,<s%> and have done <S%H7561>wickedly,<s%> and have <S%H4775>rebelled,<s%> even turning <S%H5493>aside<s%> from your <S%H4687>precepts<s%> and from your <S%H4941>ordinances;<s%>

neither have we <S%H8085>listened<s%> to your <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> who <S%H1696>spoke<s%> in your <S%H8034>name<s%> to our <S%H4428>kings,<s%> our <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and to all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> belongs to <S%H1322>you,<s%> but to us confusion of <S%H6440>face,<s%> as at this <S%H3117>day;<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and to all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who are <S%H7138>near,<s%> and who are far <S%H7350>off,<s%> through all the <S%H776>countries<s%> where you have <S%H5080>driven<s%> <S%H4604>them,<s%> because of their trespass that they have trespassed against <S%H4603>you.<s%>

<S%H136>Lord,<s%> to us belongs <S%H1322>confusion<s%> of <S%H6440>face,<s%> to our <S%H4428>kings,<s%> to our <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and to our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> because we have sinned against <S%H2398>you.<s%>
To the <S%H136>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> belong <S%H7356>mercies<s%> and <S%H5547>forgiveness;<s%> for we have rebelled against <S%H4775>him;<s%>

neither have we <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H8451>laws,<s%> which he <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us <S%H3027>by<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>

<S%H3478>Yes,<s%> all Israel have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> your <S%H8451>law,<s%> turning <S%H5493>aside,<s%> that they should not <S%H8085>obey<s%> your <S%H6963>voice:<s%> therefore the <S%H423>curse<s%> and the <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> has been <S%H5413>poured<s%> out on <S%H2398>us;<s%> for we have sinned against him.

He has <S%H6965>confirmed<s%> his <S%H1697>words,<s%> which he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> against <S%H8199>us,<s%> and against our judges who <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H935>us,<s%> by bringing on us a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil;<s%> for under the whole <S%H8064>sky,<s%> such has not been <S%H6213>done<s%> as has been <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

As it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> all this <S%H7451>evil<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H2470>us:<s%> yet have we not entreated the <S%H6440>favor<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> that we should <S%H7725>turn<s%> from our <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> and have <S%H7919>discernment<s%> in your <S%H571>truth.<s%>

Therefore has <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8245>watched<s%> over the <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it on <S%H3068>us;<s%> for Yahweh our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous<s%> in all his <S%H4639>works<s%> which he <S%H6213>does,<s%> and we have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> his <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

<S%H136>Now,<s%> Lord our <S%H430>God,<s%> who has <S%H3318>brought<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and have <S%H6213>gotten<s%> yourself <S%H8034>renown,<s%> as at this <S%H3117>day;<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> we have done <S%H7561>wickedly.<s%>

<S%H136>Lord,<s%> according to all your <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> let your <S%H639>anger<s%> and please let your <S%H2534>wrath<s%> be turned <S%H7725>away<s%> from your <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> because for our <S%H2399>sins,<s%> and for the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and your <S%H5971>people<s%> have become a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to all who are around <S%H5439>us.<s%>

Now <S%H430>therefore,<s%> our God, <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and to his <S%H8469>petitions,<s%> and cause your <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%> on your <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> that is <S%H8076>desolate,<s%> for the <S%H136>Lord<s%>'s sake.

My <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5186>turn<s%> your <S%H241>ear,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear;<s%> <S%H6491>open<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> our <S%H8074>desolations,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> which is <S%H7121>called<s%> by your <S%H8034>name:<s%> for we do not <S%H5307>present<s%> our <S%H8469>petitions<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you for our <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> but for your <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H7356>mercies<s%>' sake.

<S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H8085>hear;<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H5545>forgive;<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H7181>listen<s%> and <S%H6213>do;<s%> <S%H408>don't<s%> <S%H309>defer,<s%> for your own <S%H430>sake,<s%> my God, because your <S%H5892>city<s%> and your <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H7121>called<s%> by your <S%H8034>name.<s%>

While I was <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> and <S%H6419>praying,<s%> and <S%H3034>confessing<s%> my <S%H2403>sin<s%> and the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5307>presenting<s%> my <S%H8467>supplication<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of my <S%H430>God;<s%>

<S%H1696>yes,<s%> while I was speaking in <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1403>Gabriel,<s%> whom I had <S%H7200>seen<s%> in the <S%H2377>vision<s%> at the <S%H8462>beginning,<s%> being caused to <S%H3286>fly<s%> <S%H3288>swiftly,<s%> <S%H5060>touched<s%> me about the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>offering.<s%>

He <S%H995>instructed<s%> <S%H1696>me,<s%> and talked with <S%H559>me,<s%> and said, <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> I am now come <S%H3318>forth<s%> to give you <S%H7919>wisdom<s%> and <S%H998>understanding.<s%>

At the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of your <S%H8469>petitions<s%> the <S%H1697>commandment<s%> went <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and I have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H2532>you;<s%> for you are greatly beloved: therefore <S%H995>consider<s%> the <S%H1697>matter,<s%> and <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H4758>vision.<s%>

<S%H7657>Seventy<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> are <S%H2852>decreed<s%> on your <S%H5971>people<s%> and on your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> to <S%H3607>finish<s%> <S%H6588>disobedience,<s%> and to make an <S%H8552>end<s%> of <S%H2403>sins,<s%> and to make <S%H3722>reconciliation<s%> for <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and to bring <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and to seal <S%H2856>up<s%> <S%H2377>vision<s%> and <S%H5030>prophecy,<s%> and to <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

<S%H3045>Know<s%> therefore and <S%H7919>discern,<s%> that from the going <S%H4161>forth<s%> of the <S%H1697>commandment<s%> to <S%H7725>restore<s%> and to <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to the <S%H4899>Anointed<s%> <S%H5057>One,<s%> the prince, shall be <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7620>weeks,<s%> and <S%H8346>sixty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7620>weeks:<s%> it shall be <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> with <S%H7339>street<s%> and <S%H2742>moat,<s%> even in <S%H6695>troubled<s%> <S%H6256>times.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> the <S%H8346>sixty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> the <S%H4899>Anointed<s%> One shall be cut <S%H3772>off,<s%> and shall have <S%H5971>nothing:<s%> and the people of the <S%H5057>prince<s%> who shall <S%H935>come<s%> shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> and the <S%H6944>sanctuary;<s%> and its <S%H7093>end<s%> shall be with a <S%H7858>flood,<s%> and even to the <S%H7093>end<s%> shall be <S%H4421>war;<s%> <S%H8074>desolations<s%> are <S%H2782>determined.<s%>

He shall make a <S%H1396>firm<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H7227>many<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7620>week:<s%> and in the <S%H2677>midst<s%> of the <S%H7620>week<s%> he shall cause the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> and the <S%H4503>offering<s%> to <S%H7673>cease;<s%> and on the <S%H3671>wing<s%> of <S%H8251>abominations<s%> shall come one who makes <S%H8074>desolate;<s%> and even to the full <S%H3617>end,<s%> and that <S%H2782>determined,<s%> shall wrath be <S%H5413>poured<s%> out on the <S%H8074>desolate.<s%>
